title: I am tired of 'Which champ should I buy?" threads without proper info.
body:
You probably have seen these threads of people asking who to buy. What annoys me is this is what the average thread looks like:
> [{quoted}](name=ParisfujaMC,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=bsUxmN5B,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-06-23T11:32:11.711+0000)
> i dunno hu 2 buy pls halp me and also i like adc


When it should look like this:


> [{quoted}](name=ParisfujaMC,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=bsUxmN5B,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-06-23T11:32:11.711+0000)
> Hey! I don't know who I should buy, so I thought I would ask the boards!
> I like the following aspects of a champion -
> Roles: 
> Skill Set:
> Lane:
> Price Range:
> Other Info:
> Thanks !

You could also just do a poll on a few champs you want to buy, but cant decide which one.

replies.body: Maybe people are just asking casually and not trying to find another way to climb to diamond
We're just wanting other peoples opinion, is it that bad?
